RG pulsed during exposure, sexp & vs-st
Test all set low
Shutter all set low

This has been renamed from P02 tp P01 to supercede previous versions.
This is now P01 Revision A
24th July 2009 MAB



P02 has RG during sexp and shutter set to zero throughout - MAB 20th July 2009
P78 clone of P97 but allows me to set 10Mhz in 100KHz section using LTC2207 - MAB 16th october 2008
Above has extra exposure section added for 1uS granularity exposures. Used only when exposure < 10uS MAB
P95F85_2M.txt


Font LCR 10pt

Initial '99' pattern file to get started on Andor Clara/Sony 285 - 26th June 2008 - MAB
All clock drivers are inverters, so all clock outputs are inverted leaving FPGA - MAB
V2H and V2L schematic names swopped - clocks changed in here to compensate - MAB
TEST (24) is routed out to J16 for debugging
Updated to include AFE control functionality - first test -  CDE  08/07/08
Modified to add toggle on SHP & SHD  -  CDE  09/07/08
Modified to move FRAME, SHUTTER, ARM & FIRE to original Solis locations  - CDE 21/07/08
Modified to add toggle on SUB during Pre Exposure -  CDE  23/07/08
Modified to remove PXL toggle in HS-rd2M1 block - CDE 24/07/08
Modified PBLK to try to match surcam usage, SHP & SHD to one sys clk period - CDE 30/07/08
Changed to P95 to move horizontal clocks from 10MHz to 1MHz for LTC2207 - MAB 31/07/08
Changed to 2M for new naming. Also only for 100KHz & 1 MHz - MAB 04/08/
P94 conyains delay-HR for amplifier to power up in HR mode & HS-EXP per speed & mode - MAB 6/8/8
As P93 but now adding in amp-rsr - mab 19th august - MAB
P91 was good, but now changing to get longer for CDS samples
P84 good for 1mhz and exir mode - 100KHz running at 10MHz
V2 Clock States: columns, U27 pins 9 & 8,Out (L,M,H,Z)

VV  O
22  u
LH98t
0011L
0101Z
1010M
1100H

horizontal readout speeds:
100KHz & 1MHz - both available at normal and -HR for Extended NIR readout modes


***************************************************************
                   C L A R A   C O L U M N S
***************************************************************
ACVBSSSS 	H H R  S	V VV V V	AAALA AT 	CCFAPASF 	AKAOI PC
MSDRPPPP 	1 2 G  U 	1 22 3 4 	VSSTC RE	ODIHBSHR 	CQCDN XL
PUDADDDD         B 	  LH     	DTHCL MS	BMRDLHUA  Q QBT LR
 B  4321                  		 BDSK  T 	  E KPTM  R SPS
***************************************************************
00000000	11111100	22221111	33222222	33333333	44444444
76543210	54321098	32109876	10987654	98765432	76543210
***************************************************************
SSCLEAR pulses SubStrate pre exposure   300 lines - 3.75uS
<SSCLEAR>
00101010	00100001	00100100	01000000	11001100	00000000
00111000	00100001	00100100	01000000	11001100	00000000
<\SSCLEAR>

Below is Interline Shift
ACVBSSSS 	H H R  S	V VV V V	AAALA AT 	CCFAPASF 	AKAOI PC
MSDRPPPP 	1 2 G  U 	1 22 3 4 	VSSTC RE	ODIHBSHR 	CQCDN XL
PUDADDDD         B 	  LH     	DTHCL MS	BMRDLHUA 	Q QBT LR
 B  4321                  		 BDSK  T 	  E KPTM 	R SPS
<PDT>
00100100	00100000	10100100	01000000	11001100	00000000
00100111	00100000	10110100	01000000	11001100	00000000
00100111	00100000	00110100	01000000	11001100	00000000
00100111	00100000	00110100	01000000	11001100	00000000
00100111	00100000	00100100	01000000	11001100	00000000
00100111	00100000	00100101	01000000	11001100	00000000
00100111	00100000	00000101	01000000	11001100	00000000
00100111	00100000	00000101	01000000	11001100	00000000
00100111	00100000	10000101	01000000	11001100	00000000
00100111	00100000	10000001	01000000	11001100	00000000
00100111	00100000	10100001	01000000	11001100	00000000
00100111	00100000	10100000	01000000	11001100	00000000
00110111	00100000	10100100	01000000	11001100	00000000
<\PDT>

<VS-st>
00100000	00100000	00100100	01000000	11001100	00000100

<\VS-st>

Below should never be called, but:
<VS-all>
00100000	00100000	00100100	01000000	11001100	00000100
00100000	00100000	00100101	01000000	11001100	00000100
00100000	00100000	00000101	01000000	11001100	00000100
00100000	00100000	10000101	01000000	11001100	00000100
00100000	00100000	10000001	01000000	11001100	00000100
00100000	00100000	10100001	01000000	11001100	00000100
00100000	00100000	10100000	01000000	11001100	00000100
00110000	00100000	10100100	01000000	11001100	00000100
<\VS-all>

Below is delay to allow VDD to come up again after exp-hr otherwise  image curl at bottom
<Delay-HR>
00101111	00100000	00100100	01000000	11001100	00000110
00101111	00100000	00100100	01000000	11001100	00000110
00101111	00100000	00100100	01000000	11001100	00000110
00101111	00100000	00100100	01000000	11001100	00000110
00101111	00100000	00100100	01000000	11001100	00000110
00101111	00100000	00100100	01000000	11001100	00000110
00101111	00100000	00100100	01000000	11001100	00000110
00111111	00100000	00100100	01000000	11001100	00000110
<\Delay-HR>

00100111	00100000	10100100	01000000	11000100	00000000

00110111	00100000	10100100	01000000	11000100	00000000
<\VH>

00110000	00100000	00100100	01000000	11000100	00000000
<\HV>

Below exposure is 10uS with 1 vertical shift (6.5uS) in the middle
<HS-EXP2M1>

<HS-EXP2M1-HR>
01001001	00100000	00100100	01000000	11001100	00000100
